title: i got my access to alpha client but i cant log in.
body: I got an email saying that i got accepted to try out the Alpha League Client but i cant log in.When i try to log in it says that your account does not have access in the alpha league client.

replies.body: There currently doesn't appear to be any issues logging into the alpha client.  Just be sure that you are using the account you were accepted on, and not creating a new one.  Let me know if you're still having any issues, though!
Im sure that i am loging in with the same account because i got the email in the email that is associated with my league account,and in the Settings option it does say that MY ALPHA STATUS IS ACTIVE.
I have the same problem, please help.

Just got accepted to the alpha client myself and am having the same issue.... Not exactly sure what the problem is but hopefully somebody knows a fix. Ive gone through all the help pages and nothing has worked up to this point. I can log into the normal client same as usual, just not alpha. :/
